subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Martin St. Louis continued his revival with a goal and an assist, and Henrik Lundqvist made 31 saves, quieting critics who questioned his performance after a 4-2 loss in Game 2.
snippet: Martin St. Louis continued his revival with a goal and an assist, and Henrik Lundqvist made 31 saves, quieting critics who questioned his performance after a 4-2 loss in Game 2.
